body:
Are you sick and tired of same old boring Nebula? 

(You will be if your sunrise and you are prestige 1908504735 or something)

I have decided to make a thread where I give you challenges in Nebula, and you record them and post them here (You don't have to record them)

Challenges:

-Destroy a monument with your fist

-On a map with one shot weapons, kill somebody with a sword, or if you dare, your FIST.

-Get 100 kills in one match (Not on one shot weapons map)

-Get 200 kills in one match (Not on one shot weapons map)

-Double kill streak
(Not on one shot weapons map)

-Triple kill streak (Not on one shot weapons map)

-Quad kill streak (Not on one shot weapons map)

-5 kill streak (Not on one shot weapons map)

-6 kill streak (Not on one shot weapons map)

-7 kill streak (Not on one shot weapons map)

-Etc

-Kill someone with a golden apple

-Kill someone in full iron with a golden apple

-Kill someone in full diamond with a golden apple

-Kill legoche from 100 blocks away with a bow

-Get a longshot of 100 blocks

-Get a longkill of 100 blocks

-Get a longshot of 200 blocks

-Get a longkill of 200 blocks

-Break a monument while spinning around it and by standing still

-Break a monument when there is a defender and break it without shifting

-Break all monuments on any DTM map without hitting or killing ANYONE.
Suggest more in the comments, post recording in the comments and have fun!!!!
